title: 07/02/21 DPS Hour 1 Charles Barkley
itunes:title: 07/02/21 DPS Hour 1 Charles Barkley
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan lambasts Washington Football Team owner Dan Snyder after the franchise announced a leadership restructuring following a bevy of lawsuits from former female staff members and an overall rocky, embarrassing 2020. Also, reaction to the ongoing Eastern Conference Finals tilt. Finally, basketball Hall of Fame member and "Inside The NBA" analyst Charles Barkley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
